bibl.title: Jitse H.F. DIJKSTRA and Jaqueline WININGER, in collaboration with several authors, The Town of Syene. Report of the 3rd and 4th Season in Aswan. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Swiss-Egyptian Mission, 2002-2003 and 2003-2004. - The late Roman domestic quarter south of the temple of Isis. - The later reuse of the temple. - Rescue excavations in 3 construction sites (in one of these a baptistery associated to a martyr's tomb was discovered). - Ptolemaic and early Roman residential area in the southern town.
bibl.seg: VON PILGRIM Cornelius, Kai-Christian BRUHN, Jitse H.F. DIJKSTRA and Jaqueline WININGER, in collaboration with several authors, The Town of Syene. Report of the 3rd and 4th Season in Aswan. Avec résumé en anglais.
MDIK 62 (2006) pp. 215-277, 1 graphique, profils, 23 plans et pll. 43-52.

Swiss-Egyptian Mission, 2002-2003 and 2003-2004. - The late Roman domestic quarter south of the temple of Isis. - The later reuse of the temple. - Rescue excavations in 3 construction sites (in one of these a baptistery associated to a martyr's tomb was discovered). - Ptolemaic and early Roman residential area in the southern town.
